clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Xiidra on Comfort and Dryness in Symptomatic Contact Lens Wearers
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Xiidra on Comfort and Dryness in Symptomatic Contact Lens Wearers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study to evaluate changes in comfort and dryness in symptomatic contact lens (CL) wearers after using Xiidra (lifitegrast 5.0% ophthalmic solution) for 12 weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Difference in contact lens-related discomfort at 12 weeks compared to baseline
primary_outcome.description: Participants rate their contact lens-related discomfort on a scale from 0 (no discomfort) to 100 (maximal discomfort).

primary_outcome.measure: Difference in contact lens-related dryness at 12 weeks compared to baseline
primary_outcome.description: Participants rate their contact lens-related dryness on a scale from 0 (no discomfort) to 100 (maximal discomfort).

arm_group.description: Each participant will use the same study drops, Xiidra, over the course of the 12-week study.
